main.name: Ruchika Gosain
main.description: I have done Masters of Computer Applications. I have 5 years' experience in Digital Marketing. Recently, I have graduated as a Full Stack Web Developer from Lighthouse Labs. Recently, I Started as a Part-time Job in lighthouse labs as a Mentor Assistance.  In here, I am helping students for the queries and solving problems regarding the code issues and also provide the guidance and advice to the students.
main.bio: I am passionate about eager to learn new things, promote their website, developing and designing. My Soft skills are Teamwork, Interpersonal Skills and Creativity because I love to communicate with others and actively listen. Lastly, Marketing is the very creative profession such as social media, advertising, and much more. My Tech Skills are Computer Programming, Design the websites and Digital Marketing because I have developed many websites and also I love to do website promotions. I quickly adapt the new ideas. I love hiking and explore for the different areas. Now, I am eager to meet the new challenges.
main.contactmessage: Hi, I am looking for a new opportunties as a Front-End Developer.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
